description.en:
A special mini-edition of Yuri Hime magazine with extremely short manga by Yurihime authors. This book was a special send-away item and is not available in stores.

[b]Sayuri-hime 1[/b]
[spoiler]
► [b]Traces of Snow[/b], by Takahashi Mako
The protagonist goes to visit an old friend.
► [b]A Devil's Sweet Snare[/b], by Hakamada Mera
A very short story about sweetness.
► [b]Another Flower Blooms[/b], by Fujieda Miyabi
A very short extra story set in the [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/5623]The Miko's Words and the Witch's Incantations[/url].
► [b]The Mystery of the Yuri Cage[/b], by Chi-Ran
A mini-sequel to [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/7059]The Yuri Cage[/url]. It's about the main character's cousin, who happens to be in love with her.
► [b][url=https://mangadex.org/manga/7081]First Love Sisters[/url] extra[/b], by Shinonome Mizuo
We learn more about Teshigawara Chiori.
► [b][url=https://mangadex.org/manga/7083]Nanami and Misuzu[/url] extra[/b], by Minakata Sunao
Nanami returns to the school one night for something she forgot.
[/spoiler]

[b]Sayuri-hime 2[/b]
[spoiler]
► [b]Dream Trip[/b], by Chi-Ran
A mini-sequel to [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/7059]Dream Drops[/url].
► [b][url=https://mangadex.org/manga/6195]Honey Crush[/url] extra[/b], by Tsubaki Asu
Mitsu is over at Kyouko's place.
► [b][url=https://mangadex.org/manga/23610]President and Vice-President[/url] extra[/b], by Hakamada Mera
The president dreams about getting a massage from the vice president.
► [b]Midsummer Lovers[/b], by Morishima Akiko
A short but sweet story about a woman visiting her first love.
► [b]Summer Window Chatting at Night[/b], by Kazuma Kowo
Nanao finds something of Matsumoto's. (This short is part of [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/5762]Junsui Adolescence[/url] series.)
► [b]Apple Day Dream extra[/b], by Jounouchi Nene
About tests of courage.
► [b]Sweetly Reeling[/b], by Seiro Yuzuha
A girl finds out why her classmate always wears long sleeves to school.
► [b][url=https://mangadex.org/manga/7083]Nanami[/url] and Misuzu extra[/b], by Minakata Sunao
The Sayuri-hime 2 installment of Nanami and Misuzu is about summer.
► [b]Instant Summer[/b], by Natsuneko
Extra of [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/5791]Butterfly 69[/url], Maria tries to turn the tables on Ageha.
► [b]Magical Chocolate[/b], by Otsu Hiyori
A girl gives her friend a piece of magical chocolate. Included in [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/7588]Orange Yellow[/url].
[/spoiler]

[b]Sayuri-hime 3[/b]
[spoiler]
► [b]Another Sweet Field[/b], by Nanzaki Iku
About the characters from Sweet Little Devil and Heart and Soul. Sayo wants to be Ritsuko's bride when they grow up.
► [b]Quilt Queen extra[/b], by Natsuneko
Extra for [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/5791]Quilt Queen[/url], the couple attends a friend's wedding.
► [b]Apple Day Dream extra 2, by Jounouchi Nene
About summer.
► [b]Summer Nude[/b], by Kazuma Kowo
Abi wants to go to the pool but Kiiko is reluctant.  (Part of [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/5762]Junsui Adolescence[/url] series.)
► [b]Melting[/b], by Yotsuhara Furiko
An extra to [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/8599]Sleeping Beauty's Dream[/url]. Tsukasa and Akira are sent to get snacks for the rest of the student council.
► [b]Bashful Little Hime-chan's Summer[/b], by Mizuki Maya
Extra to Bashful Little Hime-chan in Yuri Pop.
► [b]The Flower Garden Legend[/b], by Hakamada Mera
About a school legend.
► [b]Mark[/b], by Chi-Ran
A girl's wish for love.
► [b]Sawashiro Hinako's Future[/b], by Yaya Hanatsu
It focuses on a minor character in Our Future.
[/spoiler]

[b]Sayuri-hime 4[/b]
[spoiler]
► First Impression, by Nanzaki Iku
A transfer student discovers she has something in common with the girl seated behind her.
► Soft-Boiled Fujoshi ~Before Winter Comiket~, by Morishima Akiko
Chie is working on a doujinshi on Christmas Eve.
► Beautiful Pain extra, by Natsuneko
This short focuses on the girls' mother. (Part of Butterfly 69)
► Mental Age Limits, by Kazuma Kowo
"Mental Age Limits" is a one-page short from Kazuma Kowo's Pure Water Adolescence series.
► [b]Sharing Heat[/b], by Yotsuhara Furiko
A short extra to [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/27127]A Violet at Zero Degrees Kelvin[/url]. Harunobu wants Takashi to warm her up.
► Yuru Yuri extra, by Namori
Yuru Yuri in 4-koma mode.
[/spoiler]

[b]Sayuri-hime 5[/b]
[spoiler]
► Honnou-ji no Hen, by Natsuneko
A short teacher-student story. (Part of Butterfly 69)
► My My Girl, by Sawa Nanao
► Tag, by Tanimura Marika
► The Love Jellyfish -Sting-, by Sukoyaka
► Worrying, by Takemiya Jin
(Part of Love Flicker)
[/spoiler]

[b]Sayuri-hime 7[/b]
[spoiler]
►[b]Love, Heat Haze, End-of-Summer Regrets[/b] by Ohsawa Yayoi, a short sequel to [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/18294]Dusk, Orange, The Blooming Flowers...[/url]
► [b]Summer With a Mermaid[/b] by Kurokiri Misao is an extra of [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/28777]Tears of Pearl[/url]
► [b]Flowers in the Shade[/b] by Kurokiri Misao is an extra of [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/28777]Flower of My Heart[/url]
[/spoiler]
